RelativeTranslation: Translation of the vector field relative to the emitter.
RelativeRotation: Rotation of the vector field relative to the emitter.
RelativeScale3D: Scale of the vector field relative to the emitter.
Intensity: Intensity of the local vector field.
bTileX: Tile vector field in x axis?
bTileY: Tile vector field in y axis?
bTileZ: Tile vector field in z axis?
bUseFixDT: Use fix delta time in the simulation?
